title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
created_time: November 04, 2022, 11:32:56 AMLast edit: November 11, 2022, 02:45:52 AM by Little Mouse

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: I see that you are part of $ISLAND project. Could you perhaps illuminate how that works? On the level of tokenomics, would i benefit from CRO BABY by holding $island or vice versa.$island whitepaper doesn't have too much details on how this partnership works, nor i can't see anything in your page. Except the fact you are describing it as a "Companion".Also do you have any transparent data about your 1% Donation Fund being distributed?

comments.author: CROBABY
comments.body: Thank you for your kind message o48o.We assume you already checked www.theisland.live and there on main page saw us as a partner of The ISLANDAs a start in our Bounty Campaign and marketing activities we have at hand some $ISLND to share with our partners and investors (airdrops are also planned for CROBABY Holders and ASLAN NFT Owners)The main and more important partnership part comes on the stage when we mention about ASLAN in CRONOS LAND, our Play2Earn FREE Game will also support CRONOS PLAY on UNREAL ENGINE.More details about this will be posted in January with concrete updates and progress news.1% Donation Fund will be exclusively used on the 3rd Party Charities (from Hospitals to NGO´s and other organizations like Doctors without Borders, Rainforest Action Network, Australian Koala Foundation, and others) as listed on our Website: www.cro.babyQuote from: o48o on November 04, 2022, 01:35:19 PMI see that you are part of $ISLAND project. Could you perhaps illuminate how that works? On the level of tokenomics, would i benefit from CRO BABY by holding $island or vice versa.$island whitepaper doesn't have too much details on how this partnership works, nor i can't see anything in your page. Except the fact you are describing it as a "Companion".Also do you have any transparent data about your 1% Donation Fund being distributed?

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: CROBABY on November 04, 2022, 07:19:50 PMThank you for your kind message o48o.We assume you already checked www.theisland.live and there on main page saw us as a partner of The ISLANDYes, that's why i asked if you know how your partnership works, because i find it all confusing and don't see how $ISLND is going to be used or in any way essential in the whole ecosystem. There are no clear tokenomics or game theory behind it that i can find. Since you guys partnered with them i thought that they might have shared a reason for you to do so.Quote from: CROBABY on November 04, 2022, 07:19:50 PM1% Donation Fund will be exclusively used on the 3rd Party Charities (from Hospitals to NGO´s and other organizations like Doctors without Borders, Rainforest Action Network, Australian Koala Foundation, and others) as listed on our Website: www.cro.babyWhat i mean by transparent data is that are you going to be providing proof of payment? As anyone can say that they gave money to charity but without proof no one knows if they just pocketed it for themselves.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: why is the liquidity of CROBABY very little, the APR rate for hold tokens is good but you need to add more liquidity to CROBABY tokens, if the liquidity is very small of course the general public will hesitate to buy and intend to hold CROBABY tokens

comments.author: MuffinMaster
comments.body: Hello, what happened?I haven't seen any official information anywhere that the CRO BABY project has been suspended.Has the entire project been cancelled, or is it just about the bounty campaign?

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Quote from: MuffinMaster on November 07, 2022, 01:58:49 AMHello, what happened?I haven't seen any official information anywhere that the CRO BABY project has been suspended.Has the entire project been cancelled, or is it just about the bounty campaign?there may be doubts because liquidity is very low I didn't see the trade from the start being opened, but I saw it looked like liquidity was pulled, usually like that from the team closing the project but we don't know the truth, let's wait for more information to find out the truth of the Crobaby project

comments.author: MuffinMaster
comments.body: The case is now clear, unfortunately, but the whole project has been cancelled:Official tweet - https://twitter.com/crobabytoken/status/1589382958573494272"Official Announcement:This project CRO BABY / $CROBABY / http://cro.baby along with its game "ASLAN in CRONOS LAND" http://cronos.land and all elements, like NFT Collection, Staking, Reward Token and All are CANCELLED."https://www.cro.baby/ - "THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED."https://www.cronos.land/ - THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED."It is a pity that no reason was given for such a ruthless decision.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Quote from: MuffinMaster on November 07, 2022, 06:21:27 PMThe case is now clear, unfortunately, but the whole project has been cancelled:Official tweet - https://twitter.com/crobabytoken/status/1589382958573494272"Official Announcement:This project CRO BABY / $CROBABY / http://cro.baby along with its game "ASLAN in CRONOS LAND" http://cronos.land and all elements, like NFT Collection, Staking, Reward Token and All are CANCELLED."https://www.cro.baby/ - "THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED."https://www.cronos.land/ - THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED."It is a pity that no reason was given for such a ruthless decision.it would be fair if they compensate for the people who suffered losses due to trading CROBABY tokens, because I see them making unilateral decisions, they withdraw liquidity without any notification, you could say they took investors' money away

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on November 11, 2022, 04:53:45 PMit would be fair if they compensate for the people who suffered losses due to trading CROBABY tokens, because I see them making unilateral decisions, they withdraw liquidity without any notification, you could say they took investors' money awayLegally they should give "ico"or "presale" money back to token holders. But i don't think anyone lost that much money that they are willing to take this to court. Officials could be interested about this though and there are tons of free government funded reporting systems for whitle blowers about unregulated icos, online scams and such.Although i am not sure it they want to waste their time as hunting pseudonymous scammers that takes a ton of time and resources. Often they get help firms that trace blockchain transactions as a service and if they won't give their services for free, it can cost way more then stolen amount, and everyone's salary who is involved in the search. So finding them might not be anyone's priority.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on November 11, 2022, 05:15:28 PMQuote from: Blowon on November 11, 2022, 04:53:45 PMit would be fair if they compensate for the people who suffered losses due to trading CROBABY tokens, because I see them making unilateral decisions, they withdraw liquidity without any notification, you could say they took investors' money awayLegally they should give "ico"or "presale" money back to token holders. But i don't think anyone lost that much money that they are willing to take this to court. Officials could be interested about this though and there are tons of free government funded reporting systems for whitle blowers about unregulated icos, online scams and such.Although i am not sure it they want to waste their time as hunting pseudonymous scammers that takes a ton of time and resources. Often they get help firms that trace blockchain transactions as a service and if they won't give their services for free, it can cost way more then stolen amount, and everyone's salary who is involved in the search. So finding them might not be anyone's priority.well I understand it will be difficult if we want to find them, after all they don't bring big enough money and in the digital world this has happened very often and it seems it has become a common activity and many escape so that people are also lazy to browse

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: MuffinMaster on November 07, 2022, 06:21:27 PMThe case is now clear, unfortunately, but the whole project has been cancelled:Official tweet - https://twitter.com/crobabytoken/status/1589382958573494272"Official Announcement:This project CRO BABY / $CROBABY / http://cro.baby along with its game "ASLAN in CRONOS LAND" http://cronos.land and all elements, like NFT Collection, Staking, Reward Token and All are CANCELLED."https://www.cro.baby/ - "THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED."https://www.cronos.land/ - THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED."It is a pity that no reason was given for such a ruthless decision.These are some of the risks of getting involved with new projects (well some of them). For the whole entire project to be cancelled and the team did not find it necessary to give a valid reason why the entire project was cancelled just shows the level of unprofessionalism on their part.Imagine what will happen to the funds of the investors/traders who were part of this project and thought something good will come out of it.There are too many amateur devs in this space, investors should be really careful.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on November 13, 2022, 09:38:38 AMQuote from: MuffinMaster on November 07, 2022, 06:21:27 PMThe case is now clear, unfortunately, but the whole project has been cancelled:Official tweet - https://twitter.com/crobabytoken/status/1589382958573494272"Official Announcement:This project CRO BABY / $CROBABY / http://cro.baby along with its game "ASLAN in CRONOS LAND" http://cronos.land and all elements, like NFT Collection, Staking, Reward Token and All are CANCELLED."https://www.cro.baby/ - "THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED."https://www.cronos.land/ - THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED."It is a pity that no reason was given for such a ruthless decision.These are some of the risks of getting involved with new projects (well some of them). For the whole entire project to be cancelled and the team did not find it necessary to give a valid reason why the entire project was cancelled just shows the level of unprofessionalism on their part.Imagine what will happen to the funds of the investors/traders who were part of this project and thought something good will come out of it.There are too many amateur devs in this space, investors should be really careful. it is difficult to predict, many developers already have a lot of experience in building a project, they work professionally so it will be difficult to determine, maybe they have already built several projects because they are experts at cheating and they also know how to convince investors
